translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

Having been informed by Ensign Bolilho that he had delivered to the custody of this garrison two prisoners under my order, one named Lúcio de Braga, to Your Lordship at Rio Grande to be deported according to the order of the Most Excellent Sir Your Lordship

God keep Your Lordship

Camp near Canguçu, May 16, 1844.

God keep Your Lordship Camp near Canguçu, May 16, 1844. Most Illustrious Sir Luís José Ferreira Lieutenant Colonel Commander of the 8th Battalion of Hunters. Francisco Pedro de Abreu
